Reported to House from the Committee on the District of Columbia, H. Rept. 94-597.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to transfer certain real property of the United States to the District of Columbia Redevelopment Land Agency.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on the District of Columbia, H. Rept. 94-597) Authorizes the transfer of specified real property (generally located in the Southwest section of the District of Columbia) of the United States to the District of Columbia Redevelopment Land Agency.

titles.title: A bill to transfer certain real property of the United States to the District of Columbia Redevelopment Land Agency.
